0871A46B.Toast: The hearts of ghouls may hold a secret power.

C9FCD1EA.Phase5Description: I should return to Yelesna and deliver the Ghoul Hearts to Olesia.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: Olesia, an alchemist in Yelesna, has requested that I gather Ghoul Hearts from the ravenous dead around the Creaking Mill and Morskota Lake.
